entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
